name: Argument Bingo
description:
This was a little program I made in like a night cause someone I know wanted something like it. It's a bingo board meant to be played while bearing witness to an argument, and it randomizes on startup. It was slightly modified to show on here, but overall it took me like a day to make it. Hopefully it works alright for you.

You click the spaces on the bingo board to fill them in.

Music is Better Days by Bensound
